(max-width:48em){.container{padding:3rem}}@media only screen and (max-width:37.5em){.container{padding:2rem 2rem 5rem}}.body,.btn{color:#fff;font-family:Inter,sans-serif}.btn{font-size:1.6rem;background:rgba(80,129,251,.08);border-radius:.8rem;border:4px solid transparent;height:5.6rem;transition:all .2s rgba(80,129,251,.24)}.btn-light{background-color:#5081fb;color:#051d3b;cursor:pointer}.btn-light:hover{background:#7ba4fc}.btn-light:active{border:4px solid .2s ease}.input::placeholder{color:hsla(0,0%,100%,.64)}.input:focus,.input:hover{background:hsla(0,0%,100%,.24)}.title{letter-spacing:.6rem}.header{display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:space-between}.header__logo,.header__user{width:20%}.header .logo{height:3.4rem;width:14.5rem}.header__form{margin:0 3rem;width:60%}.header .search{color:#fff;font-size:1.6rem;height:5.6rem;width:100%;padding:2rem;background:hsla(0,0%,100%,.16);border-radius:8px;border:none;outline:none;transition:all .2s ease}.header .search:focus,.header .search:hover{background:hsla(0,0%,100%,.24)}.header__search-responsive{display:none}.header .user{display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:flex-end;padding:1rem 2rem;margin-left:auto;max-width:14.5rem}.header .user-name{color:#fff;font-size:1.6rem;font-weight:lighter;margin-left:1rem}.header .user:hover{background:hsla(0,0%,100%,.08);border-radius:8px;cursor:pointer}.header__burger{display:none;justify-content:center;align-items:center;width:10%}.header__burger-icon{padding:1.5rem}.header__burger-icon:active{background:rgba(80,129,251,.16);border-radius:16px}.burger{position:relative}.burger,.burger:after,.burger:before{background:#fff;height:3px;width:2rem}.burger:after,.burger:before{content:"";position:absolute}.burger:before{top:-7px;right:0}.burger:after{top:7px;right:0}@media .logo{width:14.2rem}.header__search-responsive{display:flex;justify-content:flex-end;height:100%;width:60%}}.menu{display:flex;flex-direction:column;width:20%}.menu>:not(:last-child){margin-bottom:2rem}.menu__title{font-size:1.2rem;text-transform:uppercase;font-weight:lighter}.menu__item{display:flex;align-items:center}.menu__item-name{font-size:1.6rem;opacity:.56}.menu__item:hover{cursor:pointer}.menu__item:hover .menu__item-name{opacity:.8}.menu__item:hover .menu__icon{background:rgba(80,129,251,.64)}.menu__icon{background:#5081fb;border-radius:1.6rem;margin-right:1rem;padding:1.2rem;opacity:.16}.active>*{opacity:1}@media only screen and 2rem;resize:none;width:100%}.editor__code:focus{outline:none}.editor__code::-webkit-scrollbar{width:10px}.editor__code::-webkit-scrollbar-track{background:rgba(0,0,0,.9);border-radius:8px}.editor__code::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{background:rgba(0,0,0,.2);border-radius:8px}.editor__code::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover{background:rgba(0,0,0,.1)}.editor__buttons{position:absolute;top:4.5rem;left:4.5rem}.editor__buttons:hover{cursor:pointer}@media h3,.project__settings
